General.Name: Radaan Mediaworks India Limited
General.Description: Radaan Mediaworks India Limited operates in the media and entertainment industry in India. The company engages in the production of content for tele-serials/films, digital content, web series, events, game shows, etc.; distribution of films; theatrical play activities; and setting up of training courses, such as acting, dance, martial arts, yoga, etc. It produces serials in Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Hindi, Gujarati, and Kannada languages. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Chennai, India.
